item.title: About
item.description: I do many things. One of those things is administrating and writing for iLizwi, which is perhaps what you’re looking for. I study Philosophy and Sociology at the University of Stellenbosch, South Africa. There, I’m also involved in a few other things: I’m the 2020 Education Executive of QueerUS and I am a founding member of Students for a Democratic Society South Africa. Feel free to contact me with any queries!
